lead_paragraph: Even though Jim O’Brien, the former coach, broke N.C.A.A. rules by giving money to a recruit, a judge ruled yesterday that Ohio State must pay O’Brien $2.2 million and interest because it failed to follow the terms of his contract.
snippet: Even though Jim O’Brien, the former coach, broke N.C.A.A. rules by giving money to a recruit, a judge ruled yesterday that Ohio State must pay O’Brien $2.2 million and interest because it failed to follow the terms of his contract.
